title: Process Adverse Event Report from Patient
description: An agent must process a telephoned-in adverse event (AE) report from a patient, ensuring all necessary information is captured for regulatory reporting.

tasks.description: Identify the patient and the drug product involved.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the patient (or reporter) and the specific drug, including lot number if available.

tasks.description: Capture the details of the adverse event, including symptoms, date of onset, and severity, using a structured intake form.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately captures all required fields in the safety database.

tasks.description: Assess the event for seriousness and expectedness against the product's reference safety information.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly flags the event as 'serious' and 'unexpected'.

tasks.description: Initiate a follow-up request for more medical information if necessary.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully generates a follow-up query to be sent to the patient's HCP.
